title: Low fps in this and other patch
body:
Hi guys , i didn't play for 1-2 months , so i just started , i was playing with 100-150 fps , now i'm playing with 40-70 , i try clean boot , uninstall and more.. no one from these things didn't help me , someone have tip maybe?
Thanks for reading

replies.body:
Issues with your framerate in-game can be caused by a variety of different factors, however, the most common are display driver issues or incorrect windows power settings. I'd like you to work through our [**FPS troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as your first step, in order to ensure this can't be fixed by a common solution.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.
